content.query:
-- This is auto-generated code
SELECT
    region, COUNT(DISTINCT(customer_id)) as DistinctCustomers
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://miniproject3msktred.dfs.core.windows.net/globalmartdata/customers.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        HEADER_ROW= True,
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        FIELDTERMINATOR=',',
        ROWTERMINATOR='\n'
    ) AS [result]
group by region
